name: Old Baby Man
description:
After inventing a miraculous age rewinding formula, you must now fight free from the grip of the evil Conglomo Corp. A tyrannical makeup company that has kidnapped you and forced you to work for them against your will. You must escape but how? Maybe you could discover a way out. You must be careful though. This building is a fortress! Use everything at your disposal to escape with your life and if you can, your life's work...  Perhaps your formula could help! With the wisdom of age, the speed of youth and the stealth of a baby, find your way to safety and reclaim your formula from the evil Conglomo Corp!

Create by Joe Darcy (Triangle) and Rosie Campbell (exophagious)

Programming       Joe Darcy

Artwork         Rosie Campbell

CONTROLS

D  = Right

A  = Left

Q = Deage

E = Age

Enter = Interact 

Enter (as Old Man) = Set traps

I = To view controls in game

F = Toggle fullscreen

Escape = Quit game
